Earlestown March contest - 1st Platt Bridge, 2nd Earlestown, 3rd Legh Street. Brass Band News July 1904 states "Band no 2 had the misfortune to play during a great tumult caused by a Cinematograph show getting on fire." 3 bands competed.
Aug. 28, 2018, 10:31 a.m. June 4, 2020, 9:36 p.m.
